description: Standard meaning of 'Se' is astringent or rough. As internet slang, it replaces 'Se Se' (Color/Sex), meaning sexy, lewd, or making one horny.

examples.chinese: 穿这件衣服真的超级涩涩啊
examples.translation: Wearing these clothes is super sexy.

examples.chinese: 太欲了,这愛剧情真的太涩了
examples.translation: Too lustful, this love story makes me really horny.

examples.chinese: 我草,这动画超涩氛围场景太多了
examples.translation: Damn, this anime has too many erotic atmosphere scenes.

examples.chinese: 朋友给我发好涩涩的女人照片
examples.translation: A friend sent me a very sexy photo of a woman.

examples.chinese: 我的个人成分:30%的理智＋70%的涩涩
